snippet: Little has changed after The Times published a shocking article revealed disturbing abuses of disabled patients by New York State employees.
abstract: Editorial warns little progress had been made since 2011 New York Times report revealing disturbing abuses of disabled patients by New York State employees, despite action promised by Gov Andrew Cuomo; says bottom line is that workers who mistreat disabled should not be allowed to keep their jobs.
lead_paragraph: Little has changed after The Times published a shocking article revealed disturbing abuses of disabled patients by New York State employees.
